sentences.cn: 生活在沼泽地带的欧洲白颊鸟.

sentences.en: Habitat and Ecology: In ponds , paddy and other marshy or flooded areas.
sentences.cn: 生境与生态: 生于池沼 、 田或水沟的淤泥中,有时漂浮于深水面上.

sentences.en: Habitat and Ecology: In ponds , paddy fields and other marshy or flooded areas.
sentences.cn: 生境与生态: 生于池沼 、 水田或水沟的淤泥中,有时漂浮于深水面上.

sentences.en: Having the nature a fen ; marshy.
sentences.cn: 栏中一只鸡胜过 沼泽 中百只鸡.

sentences.en: In August 1935 , we began our march across the marshy grassland.
North American finch of marshy area.
sentences.cn: 生活在北美洲沼泽地区.

sentences.en: The ancient marshy Nile would have hosted many eye disease - causing bacteria.
sentences.cn: 湿软的古尼罗河流域或许流行着许多由细菌引起的眼科疾病.

sentences.en: The land is flat and marshy before rising to a spine of low hills.
sentences.cn: 这一带地形平坦而多沼泽,再往远去地势隆起,形成矮山陵地.

sentences.en: The low, marshy land runs out for miles toward the gulf.
sentences.cn: 这片低洼的沼泽地沿海湾方向延伸数英里。

sentences.en: The marshy land provided a breeding place for the birds.
sentences.cn: 这片沼泽地为鸟类提供了繁殖地.

sentences.en: The red army crossed the snow mountains and marshy grasslands.
sentences.cn: 红军爬雪山,过草地. (及物动词,后面跟宾语)

sentences.en: The river Till strained among some score of willow - covered, marshy islets.
sentences.cn: 铁尔河蜿蜒在几十个长满了柳树的沼泽小岛之间.

sentences.en: The surrounding land is low and marshy.
sentences.cn: 周围的地低洼而多沼泽.

sentences.en: We have to cross the marshy land.

words.tran_cn: 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

trans.tran_cn: 沼泽的，多沼泽的，湿地的
trans.tran_en: Marshy land is always wet and muddy
